version_description:
- Text-to-speech engine.
- Fixed resolution issues on iPhone 6 plus.
- Bug fixes.

- Cloud Storage. Your books will be synced via iBouquiniste server
- Fixed bug with Table of Contents for books in ePub format
- Added papers

- Fixed blurred text issue on iPhone 6
- Fixed rotation bug for some books in PDF format
- Fixed bug with cover image for some ePub books
- Fixed bug with TTS rate under iOS 9
- Fixed bug with TTS rate under iOS 9

- iPhone X support
- New black paper
- Fixed iPad Pro layout issues

- Bug fixes
- New eyes tracking
- User fonts
